description: This course will explore major theological themes discovered throughout the book of Matthew and provide modern day application gleaned from this Gospel perspective. This course has been created for those interested in learning more about Matthew's account of the Gospel and for those searching for a greater understanding of biblical interpretation. Students will have the opportunity to grow deeper in their faith and learn more about how to apply the timeless lessons from Matthew in their lives today.
title: The Book of Matthew: 30 Life Changing Principles
